entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simplify 2.1 build #45506
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SignalR Server side InvokeCoreAsync blocks connection when client is not processing result async #45503
  • DictionaryModelBinder not working with null default value in .Net 7 #45502
    8.0-preview1
  • Missing JWT token with Safari (macOS and iOS) #45501
  • Nullable `[FromQuery]` primitive says "The value 'null' is not valid" #45500
  • Blazor setDragImage with Drag & Drop #45499
    Backlog
  • RFC - add a way to specify/configure which static assets get published from an RCL #45498
    Backlog

Closed

  • Create an analyzer that warns when a parameter on a route handler delegate has a BindAsync or TryParse method that doesn't comply with RequestDelegateFactory requirements #35733
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove temporary workaround to not use msbuild server #43581
    .NET 8 Planning
  • The thrown exception's message is completely useless... #44895
  • Unable to set request body format to binary in minimal api #45265
  • Hidden version files in .NET aspnetcore installation #44559
    Backlog
  • `GetExternalLoginInfoAsync` should work even when `MapInboundClaims` is `false` #45197
  • Unable to restore item #45397
  • POST without Content-Length - 411 Length required #45495
  • .NET 6 AmbiguousMatchException Mixed Technology App #45493
  • Blazor Authentication (Hosted Web Assembly) via External Social Login Providers doesn't redirect to server endpoint on callback url to complete authentication state in deployed environment (Azure App Service) #45419
  • blazor wasm publish to IIS has error #45294
    7.0.x
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson printing errors more than once. #45311

PullRequests

Merged

  • Run code analysis on generated code to support Razor routes #45496
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Support `sub` as `ExternalLoginInfo.ProviderKey` #45198
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Analyzers: Cache route model and reuse in RouteHandlerAnalyzer #45486
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Vectorized HttpCharacters (and used IndexOfAnyValues in other places found) #45300
    Perf, blocked, area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Add transport selector interface to Kestrel sockets and QUIC transports #44832
    area-runtime
  • Run Selenium tests on Playwright via an adapter [experiment] #45284
  • Introduce non-virtual RegisterTokenProviderCore method. #45413
    area-identity
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Guard against httpcontext disconnect race #42838
    area-runtime
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm
  • [SignalR] [Java] Log 'WebSocket stopped' once #43532
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Update SpaProxy.cs #43663
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor wasm] Use provided loadBootResource function to override how config is loaded #43969
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • `IsCharWhitespace` for HTML5 spec without char[].IndexOf #44004
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Support checking for required members in minimal APIs #45084
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Use non-localized 6.0.x links in installer #45403
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] VS 17 installation #45381
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2063261 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • [release/6.0] Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45333
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45334
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor][debugging] Support Debug on Chromium #45341
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.3
  • Update OIDC sample #45349
    area-security
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45354
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `1f643f7` #45385
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `1f643f7` #45387
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `1f643f7` #45388
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `eb74422` to `f6fabbb` #45389
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable configuring the connection timeouts in HubConnectionBuilder #45463
    area-signalr
  • [release/7.0] Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45439
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Support deserializing non-nested enum from string #45411
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Use non-localized 7.0.x links in installer #45410
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization
  • [release/2.1] Use non-localized 2.1.x links in installer #45409
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization, 2.1.x
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22607.6 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution
